scripts.example:start: npm run wp:start && npm run app:dev
scripts.example:setup: npm run example:bootstrap && npm run wp:uploads:unzip && npm run wp:start && npm run wp:db:import && npm run example:stop
scripts.example:prune: npm run wp:destroy && npm run example:setup && npm run example:start
scripts.app:install: npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.wp:db:export: wp-env run cli -- wp db export /var/www/html/db/database.sql
scripts.wp:db:import: wp-env run cli -- wp db import /var/www/html/db/database.sql
